DataElement.preferredName: Ongoing Or New Adverse Event Reporting Period Occurrence Indicator
DataElement.preferredDefinition: The response to indicate ongoing or new experiences of adverse events for a reporting period.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Continue Or New Adverse Event Reporting Period Occurrence
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: Remain in force or carry on without letup; keep or maintain in unaltered condition; exist in time or space without stop or interruption._An article used to connect words, phrases, or clauses representing alternatives; used to connect alternative terms for the same thing; used in correlation; used to correct or rephrase what was previously said; otherwise._Having no previous example or precedent or parallel; of a kind not seen before._Any unfavorable or unintended disease, sign, or symptom (including an abnormal laboratory finding) that is temporally associated with the use of a medical treatment or procedure, and that may or may not be considered related to the medical treatment or procedure. Such events can be related to the intervention, dose, route of administration, patient, or caused by an interaction with another drug(s) or procedure(s)._The act of providing a short account._An interval of time._An instance of something happening, such as an event or incident.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: Remain in force or carry on without letup; keep or maintain in unaltered condition; exist in time or space without stop or interruption.:An article used to connect words, phrases, or clauses representing alternatives; used to connect alternative terms for the same thing; used in correlation; used to correct or rephrase what was previously said; otherwise.:Having no previous example or precedent or parallel; of a kind not seen before.:Any unfavorable or unintended disease, sign, or symptom (including an abnormal laboratory finding) that is temporally associated with the use of a medical treatment or procedure, and that may or may not be considered related to the medical treatment or procedure. Such events can be related to the intervention, dose, route of administration, patient, or caused by an interaction with another drug(s) or procedure(s).

Concepts.definition: Remain in force or carry on without letup; keep or maintain in unaltered condition; exist in time or space without stop or interruption.

An article used to connect words, phrases, or clauses representing alternatives; used to connect alternative terms for the same thing; used in correlation; used to correct or rephrase what was previously said; otherwise.
Having no previous example or precedent or parallel; of a kind not seen before.

Any unfavorable or unintended disease, sign, or symptom (including an abnormal laboratory finding) that is temporally associated with the use of a medical treatment or procedure, and that may or may not be considered related to the medical treatment or procedure. Such events can be related to the intervention, dose, route of administration, patient, or caused by an interaction with another drug(s) or procedure(s).

Property.preferredDefinition: The act of providing a short account.:An interval of time.:An instance of something happening, such as an event or incident.

Concepts.definition: The act of providing a short account.
An instance of something happening, such as an event or incident.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition:
any unfavorable symptoms, signs, or disease temporally associated with the use of a medical
treatment or procedure that may or may not be considered related to the medical
treatment or procedure.

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: An event, entity or condition that typically characterizes a prescribed environment or situation and determines or aids in determining whether certain stated circumstances exist or criteria are satisfied.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: Indicates that an assessment was not performed.

Concepts.definition: Indicates that an assessment was not performed.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: Not known, not observed, not recorded, or refused.

Concepts.definition: Not known, observed, recorded; or reported as unknown by the data contributor.

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: An event, entity or condition that typically characterizes a prescribed environment or situation. Indicators determine or aid in determining whether or not certain stated circumstances exist or criteria are satisfied. (On-line Medical Dictionary)

Concepts.definition: An event, entity or condition that typically characterizes a prescribed environment or situation and determines or aids in determining whether certain stated circumstances exist or criteria are satisfied.

ReferenceDocuments.name: Has the patient experienced a
ReferenceDocuments.description: Has the patient experienced any ongoing or new adverse events during this reporting period?

ReferenceDocuments.name: Ongoing Or New Related Adverse Event Reporting Period Occurrence Indicator
ReferenceDocuments.description: Has the patient experienced any ongoing or new adverse events THOUGHT TO BE RELATED (possibly, probably, definitely) to protocol treatment during this reporting period?
